src:
Super Junior Peringati 14 Tahun 'Naik-Turun' Karier
06 Nov 2019, 13:41 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Super Junior berulang tahun ke-14 pada Rabu (6/11), para anggota pun mengenang kebersamaan grup yang memiliki naik-turun karier di musik K-Pop. (Dok. SM Town)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Super Junior merayakan hari jadi ke-14 pada Rabu (6/11). Para member mengunggah perayaan tersebut melalui akun resmi Instagram. Salah satunya adalah leader SuJu, Leeteuk yang mengunggah dua foto bertuliskan '14'.Dalam satu foto, angka 14 tersebut terdiri dari nama seluruh member awal Super Junior beserta lagu-lagu yang telah dirilis sebelumnya.



Sementara itu, Siwon mengunggah foto member kala promosi 'time Slip' dengan mengatakan 14 tahun telah dilalui bersama dan berharap bisa terus bersama di masa depan.



Pesan menyentuh juga dituliskan Eunhyuk dalam unggahan di Instagram. "14 tahun. 5.110 hari. 122.640 jam. 7.358.400 menit. 441.504.000 detik. Telah lama bersama, tak terbatas untuk bersama," tulis lead dancer dan rapper Super Junior ini.



Boyband buatan SM Entertainment ini pertama kali debut pada 6 November 2005 dengan tujuan menjadi 'The Gateway to Stardom of Asia'. Sehingga, CEO SM Entertainmnet Lee Soo-man memilih member yang berpengalaman sebagai pembawa acara, model, serta penyiar radio.Berdasarkan hal itu, SM akhirnya merilis Super Junior'05 terdiri dari 12 anggota yakni Leeteuk, Heechul, Hangeng, Yesung, Kangin, Shindong, Sungmin, Eunhyuk, Siwon, Donghae, Ryeowook dan Kibum. Mereka kala itu debut dengan single 'Twins (Knock Out)'.Pada 2006, SM menambahkan Kyuhyun ke dalam formasi dan membuat nama grup akhirnya berubah menjadi Super Junior seperti yang dikenal saat ini. Setelah itu, mereka merilis single 'U' yang diunduh 400 ribu kali hanya dalam lima jam. Pada tahun yang sama, SM Entertainment membuat sub-unit baru Super Junior yakni Super Junior-K.R.Y yang beranggotakan para main dan lead vocalist yakni Kyuhyun, Ryeowook dan Yesung. KRY bukan satu-satunya sub-unit yang pernah dibuat. Super Junior juga memiliki Super Junior-M yang menyanyikan lagu-lagu Mandarin dengan anggota Hangeng, Siwon, Donghae, Kyuhyun, Ryeowook dan dua anggota baru yakni Henri dan Zhou Mi. SuJu juga memiliki Super Junior-T (Trot), Super Junior-H (Happy Happy) dan Super Junior-D&E (Donghae dan Eunhyuk). Sepanjang perjalanan karier SuJu, 2009 menjadi salah satu tahun terbaik Super Junior. Nama mereka mulai mendunia setelah merilis 'Sorry Sorry'. Album itu terjual 29 ribu kopi setelah dirilis dan menjadi album terlaris di Korea Selatan tahun itu dengan capaian 250 ribu kopi. Tak hanya di Korea, Sorry Sorry juga menjadi album terlaris di Taiwan, Thailand, China dan Filipina. Namun di tengah kesuksesan itu, mereka juga harus menghadapi sejumlah masalah, mulai dari Kibum yang tak ikut promosi dan memilih mundur karena ingin fokus akting, Kangin terlibat kasus tabrakan hingga permasalahan kontrak Hangeng dengan SM Entertainment. Jumlah member Super Junior pun perlahan mulai berkurang mulai dari Kibum, Hangkyung, Henry, hingga yang terakhir Kangin keluar pada 2019.



Sementara itu, Sungmin kini masih 'hiatus' dari seluruh aktivitas Super Junior sejak menikah pada 2015. Sehingga kini, Super Junior sibuk mempromosikan album baru mereka 'Time Slip' dengan sembilan member, yakni Leeteuk, Heechul, Yesung, Shindong, Eunhyuk, Siwon, Donghae, Ryeowook dan Kyuhyun.Seperti yang diharapkan SM di awal, sebagian besar member SuJu tak hanya mempromosikan album tapi juga menjadi pembawa acara, penyiar radio serta aktor. Sejak debut, Super Junior meraih banyak penghargaan seperti Favorite Artist of Korea MTV Asia Awards 2008, Must Follow Personality Mashable Awards 2010, Choice International Artist dan Choice Fandom (ELF) dalam Teen Choice Awards 2015, Best Live Act World Music Awards 2013, Global Artist Hollywood Music Awards 2015, dan masih banyak lagi.



Tak hanya itu, mereka juga menjadi The Goodwill Ambassador Korea 2008, Taiwan Tourism Ambassador 2010, Duta Palang Merah Nasional Korea, Duta Makanan Korea, Duta Seoul Summer Sale 2011, Duta Besar Kehormatan Distrik Gangnam, Seoul 2012. Hari jadi ke-14 ini juga diramaikan ELF (Ever Lasting Friend) atau fan Super Junior di Twitter. Tagar #14YearsWithSuperJunior serta #슈퍼주니어_14주년_다_죽여 menjadi trending topic dunia termasuk Indonesia. (chri/end)
text:
Super Junior Commemorates 14 Years 'Going Up and Down' Career
Nov 6 2019, 13:41 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Super Junior has their 14th birthday on Wednesday (6/11), the members are also remembering the group togetherness who have career ups and downs in K-Pop music. (Doc. SM Town)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Super Junior celebrates its 14th anniversary on Wednesday (6/11). The members uploaded the celebration through the official Instagram account. One of them is SuJu leader, Leeteuk who uploaded two photos that read '14'. In one photo, the number 14 consists of the names of all the initial Super Junior members along with previously released songs.



Meanwhile, Siwon uploaded a member photo during the 'Time Slip' promotion by saying 14 years had passed together and hoped to continue together in the future.



A touching message was also written by Eunhyuk in upload on Instagram. "14 years. 5,110 days. 122,640 hours. 7,358,400 minutes. 441,504,000 seconds. It's been together for a long time, not limited to being together," wrote this Super Junior lead dancer and rapper.



The boy band made by SM Entertainment first debuted on November 6, 2005 with the aim of being 'The Gateway to Stardom of Asia'. Thus, SM Entertainment CEO Lee Soo-man chose members who were experienced as radio presenters, models and broadcasters. Based on that, SM finally released Super Junior'05 consisting of 12 members namely Leeteuk, Heechul, Hangeng, Yesung, Kangin, Shindong , Sungmin, Eunhyuk, Siwon, Donghae, Ryeowook and Kibum. They then debuted with the single 'Twins (Knock Out).' In 2006, SM added Kyuhyun to the formation and made the group's name finally change to Super Junior as it is known today. After that, they released the single 'U' which was downloaded 400 thousand times in just five hours. In the same year, SM Entertainment created a new Super Junior sub-unit, Super Junior-K.R.Y, which consisted of the main play and lead vocalists, Kyuhyun, Ryeowook and Yesung. KRY is not the only sub-unit ever created. Super Junior also has Super Junior-M who sing Mandarin songs with members of Hangeng, Siwon, Donghae, Kyuhyun, Ryeowook and two new members namely Henri and Zhou Mi. SuJu also has Super Junior-T (Trot), Super Junior-H (Happy Happy) and Super Junior-D & E (Donghae and Eunhyuk). Throughout SuJu's career, 2009 was one of Super Junior's best years. Their name began worldwide after releasing 'Sorry Sorry'. The album sold 29 thousand copies after it was released and became the best-selling album in South Korea that year with 250 thousand copies. Not only in Korea, Sorry Sorry also became the best-selling album in Taiwan, Thailand, China and the Philippines. But in the midst of that success, they also had to face a number of problems, ranging from Kibum who did not participate in the promotion and chose to resign because he wanted to focus on acting, Kangin was involved in a collision case to the issue of Hangeng's contract with SM Entertainment. The number of Super Junior members slowly began to decrease from Kibum, Hangkyung, Henry, until the last Kangin came out in 2019.



Meanwhile, Sungmin is still a 'hiatus' of all Super Junior activities since getting married in 2015. So now, Super Junior is busy promoting their new album 'Time Slip' with nine members, namely Leeteuk, Heechul, Yesung, Shindong, Eunhyuk, Siwon, Donghae, Ryeowook and Kyuhyun. As expected by SM in the beginning, most SuJu members not only promote the album but also host, radio broadcasters and actors. Since its debut, Super Junior has won many awards such as the Favorite Artist of Korea MTV Asia Awards 2008, Must Follow Personality Mashable Awards 2010, International Artist Choice and Fandom Choice (ELF) at the Teen Choice Awards 2015, Best Live Act World Music Awards 2013, Global Artist Hollywood Music Awards 2015, and many more.



Not only that, they also became The Korean Goodwill Ambassador 2008, Taiwan Tourism Ambassador 2010, Korean National Red Cross Ambassador, Korean Food Ambassador, 2011 Seoul Summer Sale Ambassador, Honorary Ambassador of Gangnam District, Seoul 2012. The 14th anniversary was also enlivened by ELF (Ever Lasting Friend) or Super Junior fans on Twitter. The hashtag # 14YearsWithSuperJunior and # 슈퍼 주니어 _14 주년 _ 다 _ 죽여 became a trending topic in the world including Indonesia. (chri / end)
